basics.name: Philip Noh
basics.label: Shidler Undergraduate
basics.summary: I am studying in the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii, for a B.B.A in Finance and Management Information Systems. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2023.

work.summary: Helped implement new point of sales system during the internship
highlights: Set-up, learn, and aid in the training of employees for the transition
Gained experience working behind a register and servicing customers
Collaborated with various environmental organizations to restore Native Hawaiian Lands
Worked together with team members to build fences, remove harmful entities, and plant native species

volunteer.summary: Volunteered to build a rain garden
highlights: Worked alongside other volunteers to build a rain garden, filled with native Hawaiian species

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.awarder: Vance Roley, Dean of Shidler College of Business
awards.summary: Awarded to students who showed outstanding academic achievement in terms of GPA within a semester.
